item.title: The Sound of Silence
item.description: [[songs/d/disturbed/immortalized/the_sound_of_silence.md#hello-darkness-my-old-friend-vyl-wnanory|Hello, darkness, my old friend]] [[songs/d/disturbed/immortalized/the_sound_of_silence.md#hello-darkness-my-old-friend-vyl-wnanory|I’ve come to talk with you again]] [[songs/d/disturbed/immortalized/the_sound_of_silence.md#hello-darkness-my-old-friend-vyl-wnanory|Because a vision softly creeping]] [[songs/d/disturbed/immortalized/the_sound_of_silence.md#hello-darkness-my-old-friend-vyl-wnanory|Left its seeds while I was sleeping]] [[songs/d/disturbed/immortalized/the_sound_of_silence.
